SliderEvent

enspire.interactivity.events.IInteractivityClipEvent
enspire.interactivity.events.SliderEvent

Event that is dispatched from any Movie Clip that inherits from Slider when the standard actions are performed on the widget

Summary
SliderEventEvent that is dispatched from any Movie Clip that inherits from Slider when the standard actions are performed on the widget
Variables
SLIDER_PRESSStatic enumeration returned by getType if this event was created by a mouse press.
SLIDER_RELEASEStatic enumeration returned by getType if this event was created by a mouse release.
SLIDER_OVERStatic enumeration returned by getType if this event was created by mousing over the Slider handle.
SLIDER_OUTStatic enumeration returned by getType if this event was created by mousing out of the Slider handle.
SLIDER_MOVEStatic enumeration returned by getType if this event was created by the mouse moving while over the Slider handle.
type
obj
Functions
SliderEventCreates a new SliderEvent with the given type, and a reference to the Slider instance that is linked to this event.
getTypeReturns the type of this event, which will be one of the various enumerations like SLIDER_RELEASE.
getObjReturns the Slider object that is associated with this event.

Variables

SLIDER_PRESS

public static var SLIDER_PRESS

Static enumeration returned by getType if this event was created by a mouse press.

SLIDER_RELEASE

public static var SLIDER_RELEASE

Static enumeration returned by getType if this event was created by a mouse release.

SLIDER_OVER

public static var SLIDER_OVER

Static enumeration returned by getType if this event was created by mousing over the Slider handle.

SLIDER_OUT

public static var SLIDER_OUT

Static enumeration returned by getType if this event was created by mousing out of the Slider handle.

SLIDER_MOVE

public static var SLIDER_MOVE

Static enumeration returned by getType if this event was created by the mouse moving while over the Slider handle.

type

private var type: Number

obj

private var obj: InteractivityClip

Functions

SliderEvent

public function SliderEvent(type: Number,
obj: InteractivityClip)

Creates a new SliderEvent with the given type, and a reference to the Slider instance that is linked to this event.

Example

var se = new SliderEvent(SliderEvent.SLIDER_PRESS,mcSlider);

getType

public function getType():Number

Returns the type of this event, which will be one of the various enumerations like SLIDER_RELEASE.

Example

var type = ce.getType();

getObj

public function getObj():InteractivityClip

Returns the Slider object that is associated with this event.

Example

var slider = se.getObj();
slider.gotoAndStop("over");
Base class implementing the functionality needed for a basic Slider.
public static var SLIDER_PRESS
Static enumeration returned by getType if this event was created by a mouse press.
